Creator: Socialist Federation of the Seine.
Description: 65 x 100 cm. two-sided poster.  Side  1: White background with blue text. Propaganda poster featuring the date, time, and location of a speech held by the Socialist Party.  Side 2: Red, black, and white. Propaganda poster presenting a program discussing political and social liberation.
Digitization: Original items were scanned as 600 dpi tiffs on a Zeutschel OS 14000 A0-LS scanner. They were converted to jpegs (sized at 3000 pixels on the long dimension) using Adobe Photoshop CS2 and subsequently uploaded into CONTENTdm.
Rights Notes: No known copyright. Item is in public domain as it was published prior to 1923.
Source: From: Parisiens...le Parti Socialiste vous Parlera le Jeudi 5 Avril, a 20 Heures 30 / Pour la Liberation Politique et Sociale
Subject: World War, 1939-1945; War Posters, French
Title: Parisiens...le Parti Socialiste vous Parlera le Jeudi 5 Avril, a 20 Heures 30 / Pour la Liberation Politique et Sociale
